synopsis.text:
Four Heavenly King Vermilio finds herself in a predicament as a human hero, Helck, rises to the top of the tournament held to determine the new Demon King. The tournament, a necessary event following the defeat of the previous Demon King, is monitored closely by Vermilio and her fellow demonic rulers. Despite their initial disdain for the human's participation, Helck's undeniable strength and charisma make him a formidable contender.

As villages mysteriously lose their human inhabitants, Vermilio grows suspicious of Helck's true intentions. Despite his cheerful demeanor and claims of hating humanity, she cannot shake the feeling that he is hiding something. Determined to expose his motives and protect her kingdom, Vermilio devises a plan to uncover the truth behind Helck's enigmatic smile.

Will Vermilio succeed in her quest to reveal Helck's true loyalties, or will the human hero continue to rise through the ranks of the demon world? The answer lies in the thrilling world of this captivating anime.
